location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3192 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of the Persian Gulf Resident Captain Arnold Kemballâ€™s previous letter relating to correspondence received by the Shaikh of Jaalan about acts of piracy alleged to have been committed by his subjects. Anderson writes that His Lordship in Council finds the letter from the Shaikh of Jaalan satisfactory in its tenor.
